feed.title: dive into mark
feed.tagline: A lot of effort went into making this effortless

entry.title: Atom 0.2 snapshot
entry.summary: The Atom 0.2 snapshot is out. Here are some sample feeds.

div.p: The Atom 0.2 snapshot is out. Changes from the 0.1 snapshot:

ol.li: MAY contain feed/copyright. Free-form copyright statement that applies to the feed (XXX more here). Datatype is <xsd:string>. If present, MUST NOT be blank.

li.p: MAY contain feed/generator. Datatype is <xsd:string>. If present, MUST be full URI and SHOULD point to the home page of the program which generated the feed.
Has optional @name attribute, whose datatype is also <xsd:string>. If present, @name MUST NOT be blank.

ol.li: several other changes not listed here
